channel.title: Hexen Mod [Help Wanted]
channel.description:
Currently I'm doing a graphics conversion, i.e changing lots of the graphics into sprites from Hexen. This is just for fun and your payment is the satisfaction of a having made something truly extraordinary. I can supply a full pack of all the graphics that make up Hexen but I don't want to post a link to the pack for legal reason. I can assure you that the mod itself is perfectly legal, I just don't want to post a whole bunch of ripped images on a mainstream forum. If you want them just pm me.
What me make would be for others to freely share by the way and I may want to use them for what would be a personal server. #MORE INFO UNDER SCREEN SHOTS#
Here's a link to the topic to show you what I'm up to : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,439978.0.html
Here's some screen shots of the game Hexen :
[img]http://www.penguinpetes.com/images/Hexen_ss_1.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.panzer.shamino.net/bilder/hexen.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.forceforgood.co.uk/screenshots/hexen1.png[/img]
[img]http://www.crunchgear.com/wp-content/photos/hexengpl.jpg[/img]
So I'll be wanting people who understand the sprite editor and can use it well, also should be well versed in image editing. You don't have to be a pixel art god or anything but being able to edit images with ease is helpfull.The game Heretic is actually part of the Hexen world as well so I can expect taking graphics for Heretic as well. Feel free to ask ANY questions below.

@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:36, topic:344426”]@The_AFKer - You just commented about me feeling cool, which means you assign people ‘cool’ values on here so obviously you care.

bahahahaahahah, what?

No, I was stating a fact, nothing more. Since when did the care factor come into play? Obviously I care if I’m here typing this, so there’s no need to question it. I think you’re misunderstanding what I meant, “sarcastically” you’re cool for being a long time member of a troll/borderline sociopath forum, speaking down to your fellow rejects as if though you were better than loser status.[/quote]???

item.title: Hexen Mod [Help Wanted]
item.dc:creator: @_Riley1 ☺Riley☺
item.description:
@_Riley1 wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:2, topic:344636”]I was asking if anyone knew you, as in, actually knew your real name or anything about you. No need to get personal.

Regarding RSCEmulation, it actually had its most popular spell when Zilent wasn’t an administrator. I’m not taking anything away from him as he’s put in months of work into the project but I’m certain he will say I’ve done just as much. We’re a team that work together. Criticise that all you want.[/quote]
Refer to the bold statements, I also have no idea why any of that info would matter. Addressing your comment about it peaking – It’s yet to peak, I’m sure it will reach a higher online count. Also, nearly all starting PK servers hit 50+ online the first week (assuming they have some development and such).

[quote=“Z Prototype, post:23, topic:344426”][quote author=☺Riley☺ link=topic=440805.msg3240085#msg3240085 date=1276838520]

Does anyone actually know Riley​:slight_smile:? He speaks as if he’s someone but everyone I ask has never heard of him.

I went under different aliases whenever I roamed RSC.

EDIT: @The_AFKer - You just commented about me feeling cool, which means you assign people ‘cool’ values on here so obviously you care.

@malikz - Your posts make you seem like a random troll who steals his material, and your a tryhard to get E-friends.

@Kryptix - Does anyone actually know you? What have you done to get ‘known’? Sure, you’re an administrator on RSCE…but anybody that teams-up with someone that has the same desire and ability as Zilent, can run a server with the same player count as RSCE. RSCE is known, not you Kryptix. You’ve yet to contribute to the RSC scene, and you’re in the same group as the rest of us.
[/quote]

O sorry we don’t keep track of your every account :|[/quote]
It’s fine, I don’t keep track of newfaqs that think ripping and switching sprites is development.

Read full topic
